meanings.sent1: The coinventors worked on the project as a team.
meanings.sent2: The coinventors shared the credit for their invention.
meanings.sent3: The coinventors joked about their creative process.
meanings.sent4: The bond between the coinventors was as strong as their invention.
meanings.sent5: The coinventors brainstormed ideas late into the night.

meanings.definition: The act of inventing something together.
meanings.sent1: The success of the project relied on the coinventors' collaboration.
meanings.sent2: The coinventors celebrated their joint achievement.
meanings.sent3: The coinventors' partnership led to a breakthrough invention.
meanings.sent4: The synergy between the coinventors was evident in their work.
meanings.sent5: The coinventors' innovation revolutionized the industry.
